title: FPS DROPPING DUE TO PROJECT MINIONS
body: Not sure if it's only me or what, everything was going quite smoothly after new 6.15 patch until today new project skin was released. As you know the lane minions therefore have skin as well which dragged me fps down to somewhere between 10 to 30 which is really unusual. Is anyone else experiencing the same issue?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, this could be caused by issues with the assets for these minions.
